entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate.
